mapper.select: SELECT USERID AS "userid" , PWD AS "pwd" , FULLNAME AS "fullname" , DEPARTMENT AS "department" , POSITION AS "position" , PHONE AS "phone" , NOTE AS "note" , PRIVILEGEINFO AS "privilegeinfo" , EMPLOYEEID AS "employeeid" , EMAIL AS "email" , STATUS AS "status" , CREATEBY AS "createby" , UPDATEBY AS "updateby" , ONLINE AS "online" , CHANNEL AS "channel" , OTP AS "otp" , LOCKDATE AS "lockdate" , CREATEDATE AS "createdate" , UPDATEDATE AS "updatedate" , PASSWORDEXPIRY AS "passwordexpiry" FROM USERCLIENT WHERE USERID = #{userName}
